name: QA UI Manifest QSD v1
philosophy: No dashboard/engine feel in default reader mode.
identity_rules: Gold accent reserved for highlights, not system chrome.
No component library feel or admin panel styling.
interaction_rules: Hero looks like front page; title is most prominent.
Single primary action per card: open.
Secondary actions allowed: save, share, copy.
Install CTA/help must not reflow layout.
performance_rules: Offline shows last cached content; Saved always accessible.
Rank endpoint must not block render; fallback allowed.
qa_checks: Does it read like a newspaper, not a dashboard?
Are technical signals hidden from reader mode?
Mobile/PWA navigation is clear without browser UI?
forbidden_patterns: Analytics or tracking beacons (local ledger only).
